definitions.text: someone who is not a clergyman or a professional person
of or relating to the doctrine that rejects religion and religious considerations
characteristic of or devoted to the temporal world as opposed to the spiritual world
not concerned with or devoted to religion; ; ; ,
examples: children being brought up in an entirely profane environment

definitions.text: of or relating to clergy not bound by monastic vows
characteristic of those who are not members of the clergy
examples: set his collar in laic rather than clerical position
